name: The Path of Three
description: Jane has no way to make a life for herself in the small village where she was born. She has to begin a long journey to her aunt's in town. She must pack up all she owns and survive the treacherous roads to find someplace where there's room enough for her to live and grow.  What she brings and what and who she collects along the way all determine how pleasant life in town will be for her.
